title: Stan Getz: Stan's Party (Live at Montmartre 1977) 2CD / V0
description:
In January 1977, Stan Getz performed live at the CafÃƒÂ© Montmartre Jazz-Hus in Copenhagen, Denmark, with pianist Joanne Brackeen, bassist Niels-Henning ÃƒËœrsted Pedersen, and drummer Billy Hart.
 
The excellent music recorded at these gigs was initially issued by Steeplechase on the albums Ã¢â‚¬Å“Stan's PartyÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and Ã¢â‚¬Å“Live at MontmartreÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½.

The tenor saxophonist was in good spirits, as many of the performances are extended workouts. The choice of material is very wide-ranging, delving from standards by Billy Strayhorn and Dizzy Gillespie to Wayne Shorter's post-bop works and Latin jazz.  
 
This is an excellent outing that belongs in every Stan Getz fan's collection, a supremely satisfying spread of straight-ahead jazz.
